greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numbers k such that Sum_{j=1..k-1} j*2^(j-1) is prime.
mathematica: s = 0; Do[s += (x-1)*2^(x-1)/2; If[PrimeQ[s], Print[x]], {x, 10^4}] (* _Ryan Propper_, Jan 01 2007 *)
results.author: _Jorge Coveiro_, Jul 27 2006
ext: One more term from _Ryan Propper_, Jan 01 2007
